snippet: There was little movement in the S.&P. or the Dow, but more evidence released on Tuesday suggest the economy is improving.
abstract: Stock market shows little change as Standard & Poor's 500-stock index loses ground for just the second time in June.
lead_paragraph: There was little movement in the S.&P. or the Dow, but more evidence released on Tuesday suggest the economy is improving.

headline.main: On a Quiet Day for Trading, S.&P. Slips and Ends Its Run of Record Highs
headline.print_headline: On a Quiet Day for Trading, S.&P. Slips and Ends Its Run of Record Highs
